Package com.epoch.evals.impl.chemEvals

Classes for evaluating responses to chemistry questions.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Atoms
    If the {largest number of contiguous, total number of} X atoms {is, is not} {=, <, >} n, or if the number of compounds whose {largest number of contiguous, total number of} X atoms {is, is not} {=, <, >} m {is, is not} {=, <, >} n ...
    BondAngle
    If the bond angle in the response {is, is not} {=, <, >} n ...
    Charge
    If the total charge {is, is not} {=, <, >} n, or if the number of compounds that have a total charge of {=, <, >, ≠, ≥, ≤} m {is, is not} {=, <, >} n ...
    Chiral
    If {none, any, some but not all, all} of the enumerated stereoisomers of the response molecule(s) are {chiral, achiral} ...
    CompareNumsOfNums
    Contains objects and methods shared by evaluators that compare numbers of molecules that have a numerical property.
    Conformations
    Parent class for ConformChair and ConformBond; contains some common methods and constants.
    ConformBond
    If two specified groups {are, are not} {anti, gauche, staggered, eclipsed} ...
    ConformChair
    If the number of {axial, equatorial} _ groups {is, is not} {=, <, >} n ...
    Contains
    If {no, the only, exactly one, any, not all, all} compounds in the response {contain, do not contain} the {substructure, skeleton} ...
    CountMetals
    If the number of compounds that {have, don't have} {=, <, >} m {metal, transition-metal} atoms {is, is not} {=, <, >} n ...
    FnalGroup
    If the number of compounds that {have, don't have} {=, <, >} m occurrences of a functional group {is, is not} {=, <, >} n ...
    FormulaFormat
    If the format of the formula {violates, does not violate} the rule ...
    FormulaWeight
    If the formula has an {exact, average} molecular weight that {is, is not} {=, <, >} m
    Extends Weight evaluator.
    HasFormula
    If the number of compounds that {have, don't have} the given formula {is, is not} {=, <, >} n ...
    Is
    If {no, the only, exactly one, any, not all, all} compounds in the response are identical, or are identical or enantiomeric, or are identical without normalization, or are identical or resonance structures, or have the same σ-bond network ...
    Is2DChair
    If the only 2D chair in the response is {identical, identical or enantiomeric} to the author's structure ...
    MapMatcher
    Alters normal JChem matching behavior so that if a query atom is mapped, the target atom must have the same map, and if a query atom is unmapped, the target atom may or may not have to have the same map.
    MapProperty
    If the response {selection, mapping, mapping pattern} is {exactly, at least} the author's mapping ...
    MapSelectionsCounter
    Calculate the grade from the number of response selections that match and don't match the author's selections ...
    NumMols
    If the {total number of compounds, number of distinct compounds} in the response {is, is not} {=, <, >} n ...
    Rings
    If the number of rings {is, is not} {=, <, >} n, or if the number of compounds {with, without} {=, <, >} m rings {is, is not} {=, <, >} n ...
    SixMembRing
    Utility class used by ConformChair and Is2DChair classes.
    UnsaturIndex
    If the formula's unsaturation index {is, is not} {=, <, >} n or is negative or fractional ...
    Weight
    If the number of compounds that have an {exact, average} molecular weight that {is, is not} {=, <, >} m {is, is not} {=, <, >} n ...

Package com.epoch.evals.impl.chemEvals Description

Classes for evaluating responses to chemistry questions.
